key.name: notifications
key.summary: Show notifications when key state changes
key.description: Set false to suppress num-lock or caps-lock state change notifications

key.name: style
key.description: Set numlock value to display only num-lock indicator, set capslock value to display only caps-lock indicator, set scrolllock value to display only scroll-lock indicator, set numcaps to show both num-lock and caps-lock, set capsscrl to show both caps-lock and scroll-lock, set numscrl to show both num-lock and scroll-lock, or all for all three. Set show-hide, to display corresponding indicator icons only when on.
